#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	//cin.tie(0);

	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin >> n;
		int a[n][n];
		for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
		{
			for (int j=0; j<n; j++)
			{
				cin >> a[i][j];
			}
		}

		for (int i=0; i<=n/2; i++)
		{
			for (int j=0; j<=n/2; j++)
			{
				if (a[i][j]!=a[n-i-1][n-j-1]) 
				{
					cout << "No\n";
					goto reboot;
				}
			}
		}

		cout << "Yes\n";
		reboot: ;
	}
}
